detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :
	Contract MCT (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MCT.sol#66-179) has payable functions:
	 - MCT.fallback() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MCT.sol#176-178)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
detectors.markdown:
Contract locking ether found in :

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description: Variable MCT._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MCT.sol#70) is not in mixedCase
